CIPHER.212.cipherString: Human nature is so constituted that all see and judge better in the affairs of other men than in their own.
CIPHER.212.question: A quote by Terence has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.212.author: Terence

CIPHER.205.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 569 461261 8703 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.194.cipherString: Happy is entirely up to you and always has been.
CIPHER.194.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Janette Rallison using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.194.author: Janette Rallison

CIPHER.196.question: Decode the following quote by Gaelic Proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of ARTS.
CIPHER.196.author: Gaelic Proverb

CIPHER.193.cipherString: To me, thee greatest lpeasure of writign si not hwat its about, ubt the inner umsic that words make.
CIPHER.193.question: A friend of yours tried to encode a quote by Truman Capote as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  However they turn out to be a terrible speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.193.author: Truman Capote

CIPHER.199.cipherString: My boat sails freely, both with wind and stream.
CIPHER.199.question: The following symbols encode a quote by William Shakespeare using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.199.author: William Shakespeare

CIPHER.191.cipherString: A nice box of chocolates provide your total daily intake of calories in one place. Isn't that handy?
CIPHER.191.question: An observation has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.191.author: Unknown

CIPHER.207.cipherString: I left the room with silent dignity, but caught my foot in the mat.
CIPHER.207.question: A quote by George and Weedon Grossmith has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with I LEFT TH.
CIPHER.207.author: George and Weedon Grossmith

CIPHER.200.cipherString: Ethics is doing the right thing when no one is watching, especially when you think no one ever will.
CIPHER.200.question: A quote by Kuruvilla Pandikattu has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.200.author: Kuruvilla Pandikattu

CIPHER.201.cipherString: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
CIPHER.201.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by John Leonard using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with ITTAK
CIPHER.201.author: John Leonard

CIPHER.198.cipherString: I want to do more documentaries and travel to places I haven't been. That is where I think I can be fulfilled.
CIPHER.198.question: A quote by Tatjana Patitz has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.198.author: Tatjana Patitz

CIPHER.195.cipherString: A fruit that comes forth is the desire and joy for the labor of a farmer.
CIPHER.195.question: The following quote by Sunday Adelaja needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of LANDS and polybius key of DRAGONFLIES.
CIPHER.195.author: Sunday Adelaja

CIPHER.202.cipherString: Nothing is less in our power than the heart, and, far from commanding it, we are forced to obey it.
CIPHER.202.question: A quote by Rousseau has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.202.author: Rousseau

CIPHER.203.question: Decode the following quote by Louise Berliawsky Nevelson which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of TOLD.
CIPHER.203.author: Louise Berliawsky Nevelson

CIPHER.209.cipherString: We would like to live as we once lived, but history will not permit it.
CIPHER.209.question: The following quote by John F. Kennedy needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SHINE
CIPHER.209.author: John F. Kennedy

CIPHER.192.cipherString: Nature was neither fair nor unfair. Those terms belonged to the world of men.
CIPHER.192.question: A quote by Carsten Jensen has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ETERMS somewhere in it.
CIPHER.192.author: Carsten Jensen

CIPHER.208.cipherString: Unwinding a habit that you have allowed to entangle you can be difficult. But the power is in you. Do not despair.
CIPHER.208.question: A quote by Boyd K. Packer has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.208.author: Boyd K. Packer

CIPHER.197.cipherString: Surely no child, and few adults, have ever watched a bird in flight without envy.
CIPHER.197.question: The following quote by Isaac Asimov needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of CLIMB and polybius key of TRIUMPHAL.
CIPHER.197.author: Isaac Asimov

CIPHER.210.cipherString: In any case, we do not advance the human cause by refusing to consider ideas that make us frightened.
CIPHER.210.question: A quote by Carl Sagan has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told that the second word decodes to be “ANY”
CIPHER.210.author: Carl Sagan

CIPHER.190.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 6 21443 98675. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.206.cipherString: The power is yours if you seize it make sure each move you take moves you closer to your goals.
CIPHER.206.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.206.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.211.cipherString: For that which is without a beginning, a final cause need not be sought.
CIPHER.211.question: A quote by Maimonides has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has A FINAL somewhere in it.
CIPHER.211.author: Maimonides

CIPHER.204.cipherString: La expresión por sí sola puede investir a la belleza con un dominio supremo y duradero sobre el ojo.
CIPHER.204.question: A quote by Fuseli in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.204.author: Fuseli
CIPHER.204.translation: Expression alone can invest beauty with supreme and lasting command over the eye.
